title: Telegraph hits 400k subscribers as Brexit boosts digital growth
text:
Telegraph Media Group has more than 400,000 paying subscribers to its digital and print journalism, the company reveals today.

The milestone, which was passed earlier this month, comes after digital subscription growth increased dramatically during the first nine months of this year, driven by strong interest in The Telegraph’s Brexit coverage and by continued investment in journalism.

Average revenue per user (Arpu) stands just north of £200 across its subscriber base, the company, which publishes The Daily Telegraph, The Sunday Telegraph, telegraph.co.uk and a suite of apps and email products, said, as it was able to grow volumes strongly without sacrificing pricing.
